scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r frontend/app/app-launcher/src/* dist/ && mkdir dist/expensing && cp -r frontend/app/expensing/src/* dist/expensing/ && mkdir dist/invoicing && cp -r frontend/app/invoicing/src/* dist/invoicing/ && mkdir dist/productivity-metrics && cp -r frontend/app/productivity-metrics-extension/src/* dist/productivity-metrics/ && cp -r shared dist/ && sed -i '' 's|../../../shared|../shared|g' dist/invoicing/index.html
